channel.title: Vindiction614 || Spawnscape614 || Cash Spawn
channel.description:
[COLOR="#EE82EE"]Well guys i have started hosting a server called vindiction 614.
[IMG]http://d2bm3ljpacyxu8.cloudfront.net/width/363/vindiction.webs.com/Vindiction%20Logo.png[/img]
I am truly sorry about the stupid webclient host from before it was my only choice getting vindiction614.co.nf [B][COLOR="#FF0000"] Webclient: [URL=http://spartascapez.com/play-now-2]http://spartascapez.com/play-now-2[/URL]
Forums:[URL=http://w8scape317.3owl.com]http://w8scape317.3owl.com[/URL][/COLOR][/B]
i believe alot of people played spawnscape and loved it so i decided to Start hosting vindiction which is basically spawnscape, everything exactally the same, the way that people liked it :)
Spawnscape Use to have about 350+ players and i am hoping to even get a fraction of that and i will be happy so i hope people enjoy any suggestions please post[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF0000"]Features[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]-Perfect Hybridding -Perfect Combat -Safe PvP -Dangerous Pvp -::item command but u have to have cash -::sellitem command -::togglepray -::vengrunes and ::lunars -shop -custom donator zone (refills spec) -Perfect PvP system -Server Messages -Trading
and much more [/COLOR] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/2fbe3f82fa1a199aca617925ef00450d.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/29550a905c0310cf3025c477968e53a0.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/1b4b1a9192ca3265a2135fcea11702a5.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/0892ba4d968d795a7b0df7ffc0f6c112.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/3ea9e094f3a7d37b760056b9e76757ae.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/e87d2cb56386250f8b9de9cad417e007.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/e5279695694ad4de51b29ca11be58209.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/e24d3bbe6d92154b7c885e8d75eaba46.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/4c7c1d2ae48b1fc43d5e7366f52f73c4.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Huge thanks to jet kai for letting me host the server the way it was:)[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/125257a96e4eeab2f7ec792751c4b381.png[/img]

item.title: Vindiction614 || Spawnscape614 || Cash Spawn

item.description:
@bhans12 wrote:

[COLOR="#EE82EE"]Well guys i have started hosting a server called vindiction 614.

I am truly sorry about the stupid webclient host from before it was my only choice
getting vindiction614.co.nf
[B][COLOR="#FF0000"] Webclient:
http://spartascapez.com/play-now-2

Forums:http://w8scape317.3owl.com[/COLOR][/B]

i believe alot of people played spawnscape and loved it so i decided to Start hosting vindiction which is basically spawnscape, everything exactally the same, the way that people liked it

Spawnscape Use to have about 350+ players and i am hoping to even get a fraction of that and i will be happy
so i hope people enjoy
any suggestions please post[/COLOR]

[COLOR="#FF0000"]Features[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF0000"]-Perfect Hybridding
-Perfect Combat
-Safe PvP
-Dangerous Pvp
-::item command but u have to have cash
-::sellitem command
-::togglepray
-::vengrunes and ::lunars
-shop
-custom donator zone (refills spec)
-Perfect PvP system
-Server Messages
-Trading

and much more
[/COLOR]
